engineer.description: Electrical Engineering student with expertise in IoT systems, embedded electronics, web development, and industrial automation. Experienced in both academic research and professional internship projects.

projects.title: RISC-V 32I Single-Cycle Processor Architecture
projects.description: Designed and implemented a complete single-cycle RISC-V RV32I processor with integrated SoC architecture including instruction and data buses, ROM, and RAM components. The project spans from VHDL hardware implementation to assembly language testing.
projects.company: BE @ ENIT - École Nationale d'Ingénieurs de Tunis
technicalDetails: Complete RV32I instruction set implementation (R, I, S, B, U, J type instructions)
SoC architecture with instruction and data buses
Modular processor core with register bank, ALU, and control unit
Instruction decoder and immediate value generation
Memory components: ROM for instructions, RAM for data with byte-enable control
Data formatting for load/store operations
Tested with assembly program for array summation operations

projects.title: OnWire Link - IoT Firmware & Mobile App
projects.description: Developed a complete IoT ecosystem during an engineering internship, including embedded firmware for ESP8266-based smart switches, a cross-platform Flutter mobile app, and complementary tools for provisioning, monitoring, and data analysis. The system integrates hybrid online/offline control, secure authentication, and automated scheduling with solar integration.
technicalDetails: Firmware developed for ESP8266 with modular architecture (configuration, communication, scheduler, monitoring, offline fallback)
Optimizations for memory, deep sleep power saving, and secure TLS/HTTPS communication
Mobile app built with Flutter using MVVM architecture, supporting real-time MQTT control and offline AP-based mode
Provisioning via QR code scanning, with guided setup and error handling
Automated scheduling including solar-based control (sunrise/sunset)
Secure authentication and cloud sync via Firebase Authentication and Firestore
Complementary applications:
• QR Code Generator (Python/Eel) – generates unique provisioning codes with SSID, password, MQTT credentials, and exports as printable PDFs
• Switcher Life Checker (Web/React) – monitors device availability in real time via MQTT, provides dashboard and alerts (email/push)
• Database File Processor (React/Node.js on Raspberry Pi 5) – processes CSV/JSON/Excel/SQLite, offers metadata extraction, filtering, visualization, batch analysis, and secure handling

projects.title: Data Fusion System for IMU Orientation Sensors
projects.description: Implemented a flight control system on STM32 leveraging accelerometers and gyroscopes for inertial sensing. Integrated a Kalman filter for sensor fusion with a magnetometer, enabling accurate real-time orientation estimation and correction and built simulation desktop application with Qt Creator and C++ to visualize the drone's behavior.
technicalDetails: Advanced Kalman Filter implementation for sensor fusion
STM32 embedded platform optimization
Qt Creator simulation environment
Real-time orientation estimation with error minimization
IMU sensor integration (accelerometers, gyroscopes)
Inno Setup for Windows application packaging

projects.title: IoT Dashboard for Connected Industrial Machines
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive data acquisition server for industrial machines with real-time web visualization interface, transformed into a standalone desktop application. Implemented WhatsApp alert system and automated consumption report generation with email delivery.
technicalDetails: Real-time data acquisition from industrial machines
Web-based visualization interface with responsive design
Desktop application conversion for offline usage
JWT authentication and secure access
Configuration management for user preference modifications
WhatsApp integration for instant alerts and notifications using Twilio API
Automated report generation with email delivery system

projects.title: Database File Processor - Full-Stack Web Application
projects.description: Built a complete React + Node.js application and hosted on a Raspberry Pi for uploading and analyzing multiple file formats (CSV, JSON, Excel, SQLite). Features interactive data visualization with dynamic tables and ChartJS graphs, with optimized memory handling for large files.
technicalDetails: Support for CSV, JSON, Excel, and SQLite file formats
Memory-optimized processing for large files using streaming
Interactive data visualization with ChartJS integration
Dynamic filtering and export capabilities
Asynchronous file reading for improved performance
Raspberry Pi hosting for low-cost deployment
User authentication and secure file management
Responsive design for accessibility on various devices
Symbolic link for config file to persist centralized settings between frontend and backend

projects.title: Real-time ESP32/Firebase Messaging System
projects.description: Built a complete instant messaging system with ESP32 microcontroller integration and Firebase backend. Implemented user authentication, message management, online status tracking, and responsive web interface with enhanced security.
technicalDetails: ESP32 microcontroller integration with Firebase
Real-time messaging with WebSocket communication
User authentication and session management
Online status tracking and presence detection
Responsive web interface with security features

projects.title: DC Motor Speed Controller with Custom PCB
projects.description: Complete electronic board design using Eagle PCB software with circuit simulation and optimization using PSpice. Developed voltage regulation system specifically for industrial motor control applications.
technicalDetails: PCB design and layout using Eagle software
Circuit simulation and optimization with PSpice
Voltage regulation system for motor control
Industrial-grade component selection
Testing and validation protocols

embedded.description: Arduino, ESP32/8266, STM32, Raspberry Pi, BeagleBone, FPGA, PCB Design

freelancer.description: Full-stack web developer and brand designer specializing in Next.js development and comprehensive brand identity solutions. Experienced in e-commerce platforms, business websites, and complete branding packages for diverse industries.

projects.title: Meninx - Car Rental Platform
projects.description: Complete web development for a professional car rental company using Next.js. Built responsive booking system, vehicle management, and customer portal with modern UI/UX design.
highlights: Complete booking system with availability management
Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop
Customer portal with booking history and preferences
Modern UI/UX design focused on user experience

projects.title: ASHE - E-commerce with Admin Dashboard
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce website with comprehensive admin dashboard for artisanal products. Developed complete brand identity, product management system, and customer interface using Next.js.
highlights: Full e-commerce functionality with product catalog
Comprehensive admin dashboard for inventory management
Complete brand identity from concept to implementation
Payment integration and order management system

projects.title: You&Me
projects.description: Modern e-commerce platform for cosmetic products with complete brand identity design. Built with Next.js featuring product catalog, shopping cart, and responsive design optimized for mobile beauty shoppers.
highlights: Mobile-first design for beauty product shopping
Product catalog with advanced filtering and search
Brand identity design including logo and color palette

projects.title: Securinets ENIT - Cybersecurity Club Branding
projects.description: Complete visual identity design for ENIT's cybersecurity club including logo design, color schemes, typography, and digital assets for social media and events.

projects.title: Restaurant & Hospitality Brand Collection
projects.description: Brand identity projects for multiple hospitality businesses including Chez Monia restaurant, Le Voilier restaurant, and Aqualight Nautic Club. Each featuring unique visual identity and marketing materials.
highlights: Unique visual identity for each client

projects.title: Event & Lifestyle Brands Portfolio
projects.description: Diverse branding projects including REBELE lifestyle brand, Kika Events event management, and various high school and individual client projects. Focus on modern, engaging visual identities.

projects.title: Educational Institution Branding
projects.description: Brand identity and marketing material design for various high schools and educational institutions. Created cohesive visual systems including logos, promotional materials, and digital assets.

projects.title: Individual Client Projects
projects.description: Custom design solutions for individual entrepreneurs and small businesses including personal branding, business cards, social media assets, and promotional materials.
